attributes.action: free the House of Commons from Cabinet control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petitition to change the law so that: 

(a) a smaller number of MP's become  Cabinet Ministers and secretaries;

(b) Cabinet members either may not sit in the Commons whilst they have a Cabinet post, or may sit but not vote.

in order that the Executive not continue to exert control over the Legislature
